org.pepstock.charba.client.options

Class ExtendedOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.Options
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.ScaledOptions
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.ExtendedOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsDefaultOptions, IsDefaultScaledOptions

    public final class ExtendedOptions
extends ScaledOptions
    Options used internally inside the chart configuration. This is the root element of configuration.
    Extends the normal options (with scales) with all methods to add callbacks and events.
    It provides also the method to set the CHARBA id when new chart is created.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void checkAndAddToParent()
      Called recursively when a property has been set in the item.
      This is mandatory because it could happen that the parent item is not present, therefore it must be added.
